section.p: The marketing department wants to promote the new box among the customers who have ever bought a box of pralines with white chocolate. Create the required query and then a standard letter with this query.

If a box contains at least 1 praline with white chocolate and this box has been purchased by a particular customer, we would like to send this customer a letter. Make sure that a customer receives no more than one letter.

section.title: Solution
section.p: First create the query. Choose tab Create Query Design (group Queries) . Add tables Customers, Orders, OrderDetails, Boxes, BoxDetails and Pralines. Add from table Customers the fields LastName, FirstName, Address, ZipCode and City. Add field ChocolateType from table Pralines with criteria White. Set in the Property Sheet at Query Properties the value of property Unique Values on Yes. Name the query intg001 and close it.
Right-click on the name of the just created query and choose Export Word Merge . Select the option to create a new document with linking data.
Insert the required fields and type de gewenste samenvoegvelden in en type the additional text, for example:
section.codeblock:
<<FirstName>> <<LastName>> <<Address>> <<ZipCode>> <<City>>
Dear <<FirstName>>, We would like to offer you an offer for our newest box ...
section.p: Finish the merge on the known manner.
